text: Frank Thomas, born Franc Georges Fernand Combès, (15 May 1936 - 20 January 2017) was a French songwriter. Over the course of his career, he wrote songs for Claude François, Sylvie Vartan, Michel Polnareff, Gilbert Bécaud, Joe Dassin and Gérard Berliner. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French songwriters
title: Frank Thomas (lyricist)
